name: Quick and Easy Apple Muffins
author: MEVERTSE
summary: A wonderful muffin recipe that's not too sweet! I like to add extra cinnamon for some more flavor. Great for breakfast with tea or coffee.
ingredients: 1 cup apple - peeled, cored, and chopped
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Lightly grease 12 muffin cups or line with paper muffin liners
Stir together flour, baking powder, sugar, cinnamon and salt
In a separate bowl, stir together milk, egg and butter
Stir egg mixture into flour mixture just until combined
Spoon batter into prepared muffin cups
Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into center of a muffin comes out clean
